name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Vincent GREEN, Appellant (two cases)

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, POMEROY, NIX and LARSEN, JJ.
ROBERTS and MANDERINO, JJ., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Vincent GREEN, Appellant (two cases).

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgments of Sentence affirmed.
ROBERTS and MANDERINO, JJ., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Herbert G. Hardin, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Edward G. Rendell, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Deputy Dist. Atty. for Law, Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Charles A. Klein, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
385 A.2d 971
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Vincent GREEN, Appellant (two cases).
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 12, 1978.
Decided May 15, 1978.
Herbert G. Hardin, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Edward G. Rendell, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Deputy Dist. Atty. for Law, Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Charles A. Klein, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, POMEROY, NIX and LARSEN, JJ.
